channel.title: Motivation
channel.description: What's a good way to motivate myself into like hosting and or programming a rsps? Lately I've had a random urge to start a server but it's like I loose interest and just say 'fuck it'.

item.title: Motivation
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I usually sit there thinking about a minigame I could make. Everything falls together at that point.

Read full topic

item.title: Motivation
item.dc:creator: @pkkid pkkid
item.description:
@pkkid wrote:

If you don’t like it then just stop…
No need to force yourself into this.

Read full topic

item.title: Motivation
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

I take breaks because I get bored. I usually find something to do like playing Xbox 360 lol. Then I get ideas to add into my server. Like currently I’m working on a new skill I’m adding called Necromancy as well as many other things on my server like my Dungeoneering base from scratch.

It’s not polite to brag.

Read full topic

item.title: Motivation
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I take breaks because I get bored. I usually find something to do like playing Xbox 360 lol. Then I get ideas to add into my server. Like currently I’m working on a new skill I’m adding called Necromancy as well as many other things on my server like my Dungeoneering base from scratch.

Read full topic

item.title: Motivation
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Don’t always attempt at programming your server, don’t let it take priority. Just do whatever you like doing, and if you get a spark of inspiration, work on the server some, take a little break, repeat. That’s what I do.

Read full topic
